Title: Raid Leader Slovan
Description:
The raiders are led by a particularly violent saurok known as Slovan. The Crane Temple usually comes to our aid when he attacks but now we find ourselves outmatched and outmaneuvered.

Please, $c, aid us by destroying this raid leader.

You can find him in his den behind the Krasari Falls.
CompletionText: Slovan has always been a nuisance, but with the Crane Temple's defenses down he has become a true threat.
RewardText:
You have done us a great service today. On behalf of my people I thank you.

Please, accept this token of our gratitude.
